subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Steve Darcis of Belgium won his second ATP title, defeating Robin Soderling of Sweden, 6-3, 7-6 (5), in the final at the Regions Morgan Keegan Championships in Memphis. Darcis won in the Netherlands last year as a qualifier. Soderling, playing in his second straight ATP final, upset top-seeded Andy Roddick to reach the semifinals.
